login.emailMismatch: Note: You're registering with a different email than the invite.
login.signupDescription: Build faster, ship smarter. All the content infrastructure you need—no friction.
login.invite:
**You're in!**

**{inviter}** just invited you to join **{name}**.
login.terms: I agree to b10cks [Terms of Service](https://www.b10cks.com/legal/terms-of-service) and [Privacy Policy](https://www.b10cks.com/legal/privacy-policy)

marketing.description:
* Modular by design with atomic block architecture for seamless content composition
* User-focused visual editor with Git-like versioning and powerful API-first approach
* Enterprise features standard for everyone — global CDN delivery without premium pricing
* **Start free. No credit card needed.**
marketing.footer: By using b10cks, you agree to our [Terms of Service](https://www.b10cks.com/legal/terms-of-service) and [Privacy Policy](https://www.b10cks.com/legal/privacy-policy), and to receive periodic emails with updates.

search.searchOrSelectField: Search fields or pick one to filter...
search.typeValueAndEnter: Type your value and hit Enter
search.keyboardNavHint: ↑↓ to navigate · Enter to select · Esc to cancel

datasets.title: Datasets
datasets.description: Manage your datasets and their entries.
datasets.noEntries: No entries yet. Create one to get started.

fields.name: Name
fields.dimensionsTranslatableDescription: Turn this on if content needs translation. Unlocks AI translation features.
fields.cacheTtlDescription: How long to cache (seconds). Set to 0 to disable.
fields.dimensionTranslatableDescription: Enable this if dimensions represent translatable content. This allows you to use AI features like translation.
fields.activeDescription: Make this dataset available via API.

datasets.createDataSourceDescription: Set up a new data source for your content.
datasets.noDataSources: No data sources yet. Create your first one.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete this data source?
deleteConfirm.description: This can't be undone. All entries will be permanently removed.

invites.empty: Feeling lonely? Invite collaborators to get started
invites.title: Invitations
invites.createDescription: Invite collaborators to work together on your project.

fields.rolePlaceholder: Choose a role for the collaborator

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Invite
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete the invite for {email}?

actions.bulkResend: Are you sure you want to resend {count} invite(s)?
actions.bulkDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {count} invite(s)?

page.title: Join an Invite
page.invalidOrExpiredDesc: The invite you're trying to use is no longer valid.
page.expiredDesc: Please contact the inviter to send you a new invite.

assets.addAssetDescription: Select an asset from your library
assets.noAssetsFoundDescription: Your asset library is empty. Upload your first asset to get started.
assets.uploadDescription: Upload files to your asset library. You can upload multiple files at once.
assets.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop files here or click to browse
assets.describeContent: Describe the content of the file

meta.title: Title
meta.robotsDescription: Control how search engines index this content
meta.canonicalDescription: The canonical URL for this content. This helps prevent duplicate content issues.

localization.label: Localization
localization.notAvailable: This space has no localization configured.

settings.disablePreviewDescription: Disable the preview panel for this content

blocks.title: Blocks
blocks.description: Build and manage your reusable content blocks.

fields.name: Block Name
fields.tagsPlaceholder: Assign tags to categorize this block
fields.tagsEmpty: No tags found. Create tags to organize your blocks.
fields.previewTemplateDescription: Use handlebars syntax to create a preview template.
fields.requiredTooltip: Users can't create an entry without filling this field.
fields.translatableTooltip: Users can translate this field in different languages.
fields.blockWhitelistPlaceholder: Choose which blocks can go inside this one
fields.blockWhitelistDescription: Only blocks you select here can be used inside this block. Leave empty to allow all.
fields.tagWhitelistDescription: Only blocks with these tags can be used inside this block. Helpful for curated block sets.
fields.fileTypesPlaceholder: Select file types this block accepts

date.formatDescription: How should dates appear and be stored?
date.minDescription: The earliest date users can pick
date.maxDescription: The latest date users can pick
date.useCurrentAsDefaultDescription: New entries will default to the current date

root.label: Root Block
root.description: Top-level content like blog posts, product pages, or landing pages. Are directly created in the content tree.

nestable.label: Nestable Block
nestable.description: Building blocks like hero sections, image galleries, or CTAs. Mix and match these inside root blocks.

single.label: Singleton Block
single.description: Site-wide content like navigation or footer settings. Only one instance allowed with no nested blocks.

universal.label: Universal Block
universal.description: Flexible blocks that work anywhere. Can be created in the content tree or nested within other blocks.

link.label: Link
link.description: Link to another content or an external URL

richtext.label: Rich Text
richtext.description: Text field with rich text support

blocks.label: Blocks
blocks.description: Nest other blocks inside this field

option.label: Single Option
option.description: Pick one option from a list

options.label: Multi Options
options.description: Pick multiple options from a list

blockTags.title: Block Tags
blockTags.description: Tag your blocks to organize and filter them.
blockTags.deleteConfirmation: Delete "{name}"? This won't affect the blocks - just removes the tag.
blockTags.noTags: No tags yet. Create one to organize your blocks.

blockFolders.title: Block Folders
blockFolders.description: Organize blocks into folders for easier navigation.
blockFolders.deleteConfirmMessage: Delete "{name}"? Blocks inside will move to the root folder.
blockFolders.noFolders: No folders yet. Create one to organize your blocks.

blockTemplates.title: Block Templates
blockTemplates.description: Save block configurations as templates to speed up creation.
blockTemplates.noTemplates: No templates yet. Create one from an existing block.

fields.name: Template Name
fields.previewFileHint: Upload a screenshot to help recognize this template (optional)

delete.title: Delete Template
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the template "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

blockVersions.title: Block Versions
blockVersions.description: Track and restore previous block versions.
blockVersions.selectVersion: Pick a version to see what changed.

restore.title: Restore this version?
restore.message: We'll create a backup of the current version first. Your current work will be saved.

delete.title: Delete this version?
delete.message: Delete the version from {date}? This can't be undone.

spaces.title: Spaces
spaces.newPageDescription: Create a new content space to organize your content.

plan.title: Plan
plan.description: Choose the right plan for the space

details.title: Details
details.description: Provide additional details for your space

fields.name: Space Name
fields.nameDescription: A friendly name for your content space.
fields.slugDescription: A unique identifier for your content space.
fields.locationDescription: Where your content space will be hosted. Can be changed later.

releases.title: Releases
releases.description: Bundle your content and deploy it in releases
releases.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the release "{name}"?
releases.noReleases: No releases yet. Create your first release to get started.

redirects.title: Redirects
redirects.description: Manage URL redirects for your site
redirects.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the redirect from "{from}"?

fields.fromDescription: The source path that will be redirected
fields.toDescription: The destination path where users will be redirected
fields.statusCodeDescription: HTTP status code for the redirect

backups.title: Backups
backups.description: Create and manage space backups to protect your content and data
backups.listDescription: View and manage all your space backups
backups.createDescription: Create a new backup of your space data and content
backups.noBackups: No backups found. Create your first backup to get started.

fields.name: Name
fields.recipientsHint: Separate multiple email addresses with commas
fields.passwordHint: If set, the backup will be encrypted with AES-256

backups.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the backup "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
backups.bulkDeleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {count} backups? This action cannot be undone.

general.title: General Settings
general.description: Manage your space settings and preferences.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Manage technical settings and integrations for your space.

people.title: People
people.description: Manage team members and their access to your space.

backups.title: Backups
backups.description: Create and manage space backups for disaster recovery.

space.title: Space
space.description: Manage your space identity and basic information.
space.name: Name
space.nameDescription: This is the name that will be displayed throughout the application.
space.spaceIdDescription: This is your unique space identifier (read-only).

content.title: Content
content.description: Configure default content settings for your space.
content.defaultBlockDescription: This block type will be used when creating new content.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.warning: Deleting your space will permanently remove all content, settings, and user data. This action cannot be undone.
dangerZone.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your space and remove all associated data from our servers.

editor.title: Editor
editor.environmentsDescription: Configure preview environments for your content.
editor.name: Name
editor.visualEditorDescription: Enable or disable the visual editor for content creation.
editor.visualEditorInfo: The visual editor provides a WYSIWYG experience for content creators.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Configure language settings for your content.
i18n.languagesDescription: Add and manage supported languages for your content.
i18n.defaultLanguageDescription: This language will be used as the default for content creation. It is recommended to set this to your primary audience's language. It will be used for AI translations as well.
i18n.label: Label

slugStrategy.label: Slug Strategy
slugStrategy.description: Choose how to handle slugs for translated content.

accessTokens.title: Access Tokens
accessTokens.description: Manage API access tokens for your space.
accessTokens.name: Name
accessTokens.tokenWarning: Make sure to copy your new access token now. You won't be able to see it again!

assetLibrary.title: Asset Library
assetLibrary.description: Configure metadata fields for your asset library.
assetLibrary.label: Label

ai.title: AI Settings
ai.description: Configure AI features and monitor usage.
ai.featuresDescription: AI features include content suggestions, auto-tagging, and smart search.
ai.usageDescription: Your current token usage for this billing period.
ai.resetInfo: Your plan resets on {date}. Need more tokens?
ai.modelSelectionDescription: Choose the AI model to use for content generation and processing

members.title: Members
members.description: Manage team members and their permissions.
members.inviteDescription: Invite a new team member to collaborate on your space.
members.name: Name

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your personal information and profile settings.
profile.personalInfoDescription: Update your name and profile picture.
profile.avatarDescription: Upload a profile picture. Recommended size: 400x400px.
profile.emailReadonly: Your email address cannot be changed.

invites.title: Invitations
invites.description: View and manage your pending invitations to spaces and teams.
invites.myInvitesDescription: Invitations you've received to join spaces and teams.

security.title: Security
security.description: Manage your password and account security settings.
security.changePasswordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure.
security.newPasswordPlaceholder: Make sure it's strong and unique

apiTokens.title: API Tokens
apiTokens.description: Create personal tokens for integrations, scripts, and automation.
apiTokens.tokenWarning: Copy this token now. You won't be able to see it again.

settings.languageDescription: Select your preferred language for the interface.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account by enabling two-factor authentication (2FA).

setup.title: Set Up 2FA
setup.description: Protect your account with an authenticator app.
setup.whatIsDescription: Two-factor authentication (2FA) adds an extra layer of security by requiring both your password and a code from your authenticator app to log in.
setup.step1: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
setup.step3: Save your backup codes somewhere safe
setup.manualEntry: Can't scan? Enter this code manually:
setup.enterCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your app:
setup.confirmed: 2FA is now enabled. Your account is more secure.
setup.confirmError: That code didn't work. Try again? {error}

verify.title: Verify it's you
verify.description: Enter a code from your authenticator app.
verify.codeDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
verify.backupCodeDescription: Enter a backup code from your list

backupCodes.title: Backup Codes
backupCodes.description: These are your emergency access codes. Use them if you lose your authenticator app.
backupCodes.saveDescription: Each code works once. Store them somewhere safe (password manager, secure note, print them).
backupCodes.saveWarning: You'll only see these once. Save them before continuing.
backupCodes.confirmCheckbox: I've saved these codes somewhere safe. I understand that losing them might lock me out of my account.

twoFactor.disableWarning: Without 2FA, your account is less protected. Only turn this off if you have a good reason.

teams.pageDescription: Manage your teams and their members
teams.createDescription: Set up a new team to organize your users and spaces
teams.notFoundDescription: The team you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have access to it.
teams.empty: No teams found. Create your first team to get started.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Team
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
deleteConfirm.bulkMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {count} teams? This action cannot be undone.

teamMembers.title: Team Members
teamMembers.addDescription: Add an existing user to this team
teamMembers.empty: No members found. Add members to get started.

removeConfirm.title: Remove Member
removeConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove {firstname} {lastname} from this team?
removeConfirm.bulkMessage: Are you sure you want to remove {count} members from this team?

modes.toVisual: Switch to Visual Editor with Preview

contentVersions.setCurrentError: Failed to set version as current: {error}

teams.addUserError: Failed to add user to team: {error}
teams.removeUserError: Failed to remove user from team: {error}
